text: Qui fait de petits sauts au Québec, n’y comprend rien (laïcité, avortement, traversée par la force du Québec pour le pétrole...), et s’en retourne avec un sourire vide, le gérant d’estrade, c’est qui, donc? Il prouve que Le Québec, c’est nous. https://www.lapresse.ca/elections-federales/201909/09/01-5240477-andrew-scheer-lance-sa-campagne-a-trois-rivieres.php …

High energy & high fives with an incredibly impressive team here in Spadina-Fort York with @DianaDYoon!! People in Toronto need MPs who are in it for them – not the millionaries & powerful corporations. Diana gets that & is ready to go in #elxn43 #SpaFYpic.twitter.com/61IWqPIP5e

Here's what I believe: No Canadian should have to choose between paying their rent & buying groceries. But after hearing stories today in Toronto of soaring rent & reno-victions, it's clear that years of Liberal inaction has made that impossible choice a reality for too many.pic.twitter.com/Fmu304xXtV

Expulsée de sa résidence de 15 ans à Toronto, la famille de Miranda a été bouleversée. Les libéraux ont eu des années pour régler la crise du logement, sans résultat. Nous sommes là pour Miranda avec un plan pour construire 500 000 logements abordables & protéger les familles.pic.twitter.com/wF2Om1TQnx

After being evicted from her home of 15 years in Toronto, Miranda's family was turned upside down. The Liberals had years to fix the housing crisis & stop these stories, but failed. We're in it for Miranda with a plan to build 500k units of affordable housing & protect families.pic.twitter.com/t7DxRMWBUP
